Posts.Content: hi mandy, i was diagnosed with breast cancer last march 2010 and had right breast removed and 45 lynph nodes but only 4 showed cancer ,i refused chemo and rads and opted for tomoxafen as i dident heal very gud and was still filling with fluid up to sept so i couldent have had the other treatment.i can sympathise with hot flushes mine r wild i need a a wind turbine attached to me i thought they would have eased a little by now but im coping better wiv em .im on antidepressants but i was on them before have u tried that route ?well please feel free to ask anything   x tina
Posts.Title: Zoladex & Tamoxifen
